page.title: 08The Local Newspaper
page.content: Some children visited our{local {newspaper office}to find out about local news.Usually the paper gets at least one really interesting story a week.The main topics are the shopping centre called{The Pavilion, Sainsburys {Bentalls}and{The Angel Centre}which are all new developments.Also, the new idea about a{Sunday market}is in the news. The paper gives people a chance to discuss their worries and complaints. There has been a lot of trouble with {hooliganism}in Tonbridge.The things that worry senior citizens most are {traffic}and{housing problems.}A recent story told of a man who was awarded a medal for trying to save children from a fire.{The Kent and Sussex Courier}is an important part in most peoples lives.
